column3: Barahir the Bold]], the treachery of [[Gorlim]], his death, and [[Beren

column2: Canto III]]''' - concerning the meeting of Beren and [[Lúthien
Canto IV]]''' - concerning Beren's capture and the bride-price of Lúthien as layed down by Thingol: a [[Silmarils
Canto V]]''' - concerning Lúthien in Doriath and her escape
Canto VI]]''' - concerning Beren in [[Nargothrond]], with [[Finrod
column3: Finrod Felagund]] and the scheming of [[Celegorm]] and [[Curufin]]

column2: Canto VII]]''' - concerning the battle of minds between Finrod and [[Thû]], and the fall of Finrod
Canto VIII]]''' - concerning Celegorm and Curufin's capture of Lúthien, and her meeting with [[Huan]]
Canto IX]]''' - concerning Huan's battle with Thû, the destruction of [[Tol-in-Gaurhoth
column3: Wizard's Isle]], and the freeing of Beren

column2: Canto X]]''' - concerning the second parting of Beren and Lúthien and the battle with Celegorm and Curufin
Canto XI]]''' - concerning the reunion of Beren and Lúthien and the approach to [[Thangorodrim]]
Canto XII]]''' - concerning the battle of [[Fingolfin]] and [[Morgoth]] and the enchanting of [[Carcharoth]]
Canto XIII]]''' - concerning Lúthien's dance before Morgoth, his enchantment, and the stealing of the Silmaril
Canto XIV]]''' - concerning the flight of Beren and Lúthien and the rage of Carcharoth
